abstract:
Over the past couple of years, there has been increasing interest in
applying the latest advances in machine learning to creative projects in
art, music, film, theatre and beyond. From Google's DeepDream and style
transfer to the world's first computer-generated musical playing in
London's West End, more and more creative AI projects are moving beyond
the world of research and academia into the public eye. This talk will
give an overview of how artists and creative technologists are using
machine learning.

title: Keynote: Artistic Applications of Artificial Intelligence
